body:
i'm thankful for the find my iphone feature of icloud, which lets you make your phone play a chime even if it's on silent and which helps me when i leave my phone around our house in stupid places where i cannot find it.

i'm thankful that somebody at work did a count of the most used reacjis in slack on a given day and that all of them were related to affection and laughter and care and consensus and teamwork.

i'm thankful that the tests for my work project are going well and that people like the feature where i show pictures of our company's dogs to people as an indicator of the progress they've made through the day.

i'm thankful that miso let me snuggle with her on the couch while d played video games. i'm thankful for her little paws, and for her love of paper and cardboard.

i'm thankful that though my usual pharmacy didn't have one of my prescriptions again, the first other pharmacy i called did have them and i should be able to pick it up today.

i'm thankful for the burritos i have been making for our dinners. i'm thankful that i am not overstuffing them as much as i did before, which makes them more manageable from both a caloric and handling perspective. i'm thankful for the bag of fun-size candy bars i bought at the grocery store "in case we have trick or treaters."

i'm thankful that the one piece ski suit i ordered for taking miso out in the winter is coming today, but i'm thankful also that because a warm front is coming through, it's going to be 70 degrees for the first time in a while and maybe the last time of the year.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful for the find my iphone feature of icloud, which lets you make your phone play a chime even if it's on silent and which helps me when i leave my phone around our house in stupid places where i cannot find it.

i'm thankful that somebody at work did a count of the most used reacjis in slack on a given day and that all of them were related to affection and laughter and care and consensus and teamwork.

i'm thankful that the tests for my work project are going well and that people like the feature where i show pictures of our company's dogs to people as an indicator of the progress they've made through the day.

i'm thankful that miso let me snuggle with her on the couch while d played video games. i'm thankful for her little paws, and for her love of paper and cardboard.

i'm thankful that though my usual pharmacy didn't have one of my prescriptions again, the first other pharmacy i called did have them and i should be able to pick it up today.

i'm thankful for the burritos i have been making for our dinners. i'm thankful that i am not overstuffing them as much as i did before, which makes them more manageable from both a caloric and handling perspective. i'm thankful for the bag of fun-size candy bars i bought at the grocery store "in case we have trick or treaters."

i'm thankful that the one piece ski suit i ordered for taking miso out in the winter is coming today, but i'm thankful also that because a warm front is coming through, it's going to be 70 degrees for the first time in a while and maybe the last time of the year.
